summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx Express detailing charges incurred by Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services. The invoice includes a breakdown of fees, shipment details, and payment instructions, indicating a shipment made on December 15, 2004, and signed for on December 17, 2004.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the individual responsible for the FedEx account and the associated charges detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: David Byrne
persons.context: David Byrne is listed as the recipient of a shipment sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein, with an address in London.

persons.name: Marshall
persons.context: Marshall is noted as the individual who signed for the delivery of the shipment on December 17, 2004.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein sent a shipment to David Byrne, who is the recipient listed on the invoice.
Marshall signed for the delivery of a shipment sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein.

events.title: Shipment Sent

events.title: Delivery Signed
events.description: The shipment sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein was signed for by Marshall.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022

keyFacts: The invoice is dated December 22, 2004, and details charges of $27.81 for FedEx Express services.
The shipment was sent on December 15, 2004, and delivered on December 17, 2004.
David Byrne is identified as the recipient of the shipment sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Marshall is noted as the individual who signed for the delivery of the shipment.
The invoice includes a breakdown of duties, taxes, and other fees associated with the shipment.
